post.description: Webhook is a place holder to describe webhook response in swagger.
post.summary: Webhook is a place holder to describe webhook response in swagger.

delay.description: delay until ready to be run

tries.description: number of times task was run.

account_id.description: account_id is the account associated to webhook

from_id.description: from_id if provided, original trigger of the event

to_id.description: to_id if provided, final destination of the event

attribute_key.description: hex value of the Attribute key

oracle_address.description: hex value of the Oracle address

token_id.description: hex value of the NFT token

attribute_key.description: hex value of the Attribute key

oracle_address.description: hex value of the Oracle address

token_id.description: hex value of the NFT token

role_id.description: roleID is 32 byte role ID in hex. RoleID should already be part of the document.

attribute_labels.description: AttributeLabels that are passed to the WASM for execution

target_attribute_label.description:
TargetAttributeLabel is the label of the attribute which holds the result from the executed WASM.
This attribute is automatically added and updated everytime document is updated.

key.description:
Key is either hex encoded 32 byte ID or string label.
String label is used as a preimage to sha256 for 32 byte hash.

document_id.description: if provided, creates the next version of the document.

finished_at.description: Job finished at. If empty, job is not complete yet

tasks.description: list of tasks ran under this Job
